import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Route, Routes } from 'react-router-dom' import { persistDatbase } from './Features/DataSlice' import Admin from './Pages/admin/Admin' import Home from './Pages/Home' import Login from './Pages/Login' import Nav from './Pages/Nav' import { SideBar } from './Pages/SideBar' import Signup from './Pages/Signup' const Routings = () => { const selector=useSelector(state=>state) const dispatch=useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ // localStorage.setItem("lastname", "Smith"); dispatch(persistDatbase(JSON.parse(JSONlocalStorage.getItem("dataSlice")))) },[selector]) return ( <>
} /> } /> } /> } />
) } export default Routings
